thread.title: Aetna, Humana end $34 billion merger agreement
thread.title_full: Aetna, Humana end $34 billion merger agreement

title: Aetna, Humana end $34 billion merger agreement
text:
Deals | Tue Feb 14, 2017 | 7:14am EST Aetna, Humana end $34 billion merger agreement A trader points up at a display on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange August 20, 2012. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid/File Photo 
Health insurer Aetna Inc and rival Humana Inc said on Tuesday they had mutually ended their $34 billion merger agreement. 
Aetna's decision comes weeks after a court ruled against the deal due to fears it would lower competition. 
The companies announced the deal in July 2015, but the U.S. Justice Department sued to block the transaction in last July. 
Aetna will pay Humana $1 billion as a result of the termination of the merger, the companies said. 
(Reporting by Ankur Banerjee in Bengaluru; Editing by Saumyadeb Chakrabarty) Next In Deals
